jobDescription: Business Data AnalystBasking Ridge, NJ 0792012+ Month ContractW2 OnlyJob description: The candidate will managing agile projects in the team and ensure projects stay on track by working closely with technical team members to get status. The candidate will also be responsible for coordinating and overseeing the release as a whole for the application team. The candidate will also work with team members to gather and review weekly highlights and create weekly presentations for executives. Responsible for accepting business requirements, assessing scope/impacts, creation of user stories and approach documentation, reviewing designs and creation of test cases; ability to convert business requirements/user stories into functional/system requirements; work on mutli-system complex integration projects, meets the scheduled deadlines, and resolve problems without impacting schedules or projects; demonstrates strong analysis and design skills on development for products and services that include front end and back end integration; understand the full end-to-end impacts of an initiative and have the ability to identify any impacts to other cross-functional teams/applications; work on production issue resolutions; partnering with the development leads to ensure that system is scalable, tuned for performance, and operationalized; ability to provide guidance to 3rd party partners integrating via APIs; be able to work in a fast-paced environment in which the requirements can evolve over course of project, ability to handle multiple assignments and prioritize deliverables based on business criticality; work closely with the business stakeholders and development team throughout the project; develop, execute, and validate test cases, analyze logs, database tables; experience in SQL and DevOps tools (i.e. Jenkins, JIRA); open defects with thorough details; focus on quality to minimize production defects; perform end to end functional testing; provide status reports and updates to project lead on regular basis; excellent analytical skills; strong technical and communication skills; prior experience with #### is a plus; must be a good team player.  ·  Must have experience with application development project management  ·  Must have ability to understand business, system, functional and user flows and technical terms and familiarity with APIs.  ·  Must have experience working with offsite team member and handling offshore resources.  ·  Must be able to support weekly and enterprise release coordination which requires night support  ·  Strong presentation creation skills for creating executive level presentations. Ability to customize information into a presentation that effectively and clearly communicates accomplishments or challenges to various audiences.  ·  Must have strong verbal and written communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate with different IT and business teams MUST HAVE SKILLS: Experience using Clarity, Sharepoint, JIRA and QC a plus  • Prior experience as an analyst/developer a plus  • Proficiency with MS Office suite of apps  • Expert level work with MS PowerPoint  •Exceptional analytical and problem solving skills; ability to work creatively in problem solving environment DESIRED SKILLS: • Prior experience with #### is a plus EDUCATION/CERTIFICATIONS: Bachelor’s degree with 3 plus years of experience.
